Life of Lauren

My Portfolio

Hi! My name is Lauren Lazzaro. I am an Executive Assistant, Customer Service Professional, and Former Educator seeking a career transition to Web Development. I am currently embarking on a 12-Week Immersive Boot Camp with Savvy Coders, learning Full Stack Web Development.

Skills

  • Full Stack Web Development Certification, including: JavaScript, HTML, CSS, Node and Express
  • Agile Certification
  • Familiar with Git, VS Code, Trello
  • Exceptional written and verbal communication skills, including effective listening and clear public speaking
  • Management and training experience
  • Goal setting and implementation
  • Strong organizational and time management skills

Professional Experience

Executive Assistant: KidSmart, December 2018 - April 2020

  • Executive Assistant to CEO and President.
  • Technology Services, including updating the organization's website, maintaining the databases with donor information, volunteer details, and details about what was distributed to students and teachers
  • Executive Assistant of a Large-Scale Major Gifts and Capital Campaign.
  • Office management, including the management of support staff, event coordinators, intern, and volunteers.
  • Manage communications, including face-to-face meetings, phone calls, personal emails, large-scale email blasts, social media (Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter), PowerPoint Presentations, meeting agendas and minutes, calendar invitations, event coordination, and marketing support
  • HR Management, including tracking employee benefits, submitting payroll, onboarding and offboarding

Customer Service Specialist: Natoli Engineering, October 2017 - December 2018

  • Process quotations, Purchase Orders, and related requests using Microsoft Dynamics Great Plains
  • Primary liaison between engineers, mechanics, or service technicians and the customer
  • Research tablet press and encapsulation machines to identify proper replacement parts
  • Train new employees, including creating step-by-step tutorials and sample emails
  • Increase sales by providing exceptional customer service, improving Business to Business relations

Executive Assistant: Christopher Ellyn Homes, Jan 2016 to September 2017

  • Executive Assistant to CEO
  • Operate several computer programs simultaneously, including Google Sheets, Google Calendar, Calendly, Gmail, Fonality, and Prospect Now
  • Manage and train administrative assistants
  • Administrative support for real estate investors, including scheduling appointments to view properties and managing each investorsâ€™ personal lead tracker
  • Customer service support for property owners, including incoming and outgoing calls and emails, gathering information about their property, explaining the process, answering questions, and gauging their interest in selling

More About Me

Interests and Hobbies

  • I have recently taken up kayaking, and I am quickly becoming an enthusiast! In fact, I am creating an application called Kayak Fanatic, which will serve as an informational database for kayakers. It will include:
    • A Mileage Tracker, to track your journey and pace per mile
    • Lake and River Finders, with information about places to kayak by zip code or city and state
    • Kayak Quiz, to help determine which type of kayak is right for you
    • Beginner's Guide, with tips and tricks for a successful kayak trip
    • Packing Lists, including essential items you should bring on your journeys
    • Safety Tips
  • I am really into all kinds of outdoor adventures! If it involves hiking, running, exploring, or even just a picnic in the park - you can count me in!
  • Spending time with my family!
    • I have two daughters: Ashlynn is 9 and Mila is 5.
    • Together, we like to hike, swim, go to zoos and aquariums, and cuddle up for movie nights!
  • Live Music
    • I have a pretty wide pallet when it comes to music, but my favorites to see live are:
      • Reggae bands, such as Stick Figure, Soja, Slightly Stoopid, and Rebelution
      • DJ's who mix electronic music with live instruments, such as Odesza, Griz, Big Gigantic, and Pretty Lights
